members.name: StereoPannerNode()
members.description: Creates a new instance of an StereoPannerNode object.

parameters.name: options Optional
parameters.description: Options are as follows: pan: A floating point number in the range [-1,1] indicating the position of an AudioNode in an output image. The value -1 represents full left and 1 represents full right. The default value is 0.

members.name: StereoPannerNode.pan
members.description: Is an a-rate AudioParam representing the amount of panning to apply.
